Category dropdown on add product:
I am developing ecommerce website with MERN stack and tailwind css.
While adding the product the admin needs to select the category as well. 
Now I have stored nested categories in the mongoDB. For example:
main category: Electronics
First Sub category electronics: Mobiles
First Sub category of Sub category Mobiles : Vivo
Sub category of sub category Vivo : V11
Second Sub category of Sub category Mobiles : Oppo
Sub category of sub category Oppo : O11
Second Sub category electronics: TV's

Hoerarchy:
Electronics
      Mobiles
              Vivo
                   V11
               Oppo
                    O11
      TV's

Now I created the model for storing the category that is nested categories into mongoDB and it is working fine.
I have also fetched it on the frontend of AddProduct.jsx form with the help of axios.

Now comes my main requirement:
On the AddProduct.jsx form I have created the dropdown for selecting the main category. When user selects the main category then besides the another dropdown will be displayed that contains all the sub categories of the selected main category. Then user selects the subcategory and if that sub category of the main category again contains the sub categories then in the same dropdown the values of that sub category should be displayed and so on since it is nested categories.

I will provide you:
AddProduct.jsx  -- frontend for adding the product
addcategoryController.js -- backend for fetching the categories from frontend that is AddProduct.jsx
resinArts.categories.json -- I have previously added 2 categories in the mongoDB through AddCategory.jsx and its backend addCategoryController.js
